comments.raw_text:
Sites show so fuzzy they are nearly unreadable.

1. Browse to www.clarin.com
2. Notice the fuzziness

The site should look readable, not at all fuzzy


I found this bug today's birch build (20111127) using a Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 and Android 3.1.

I have this problem using FF 19.0.2 on an HP p7-1020, with a 20' Hannspree monitor. I never noticed the problem until recently, some verbiage on web sites will display fine then in a few minutes become unreadable. Have tried same with Chrome/IE 10.0 and do not see the same problems. Even updated my Graphics driver, but to no avail. It still messes up the working, causing the words to display as garbage along with distorted colors. Not sure what should  be done on this matter, so any suggestions will be appreciated.
